get.summary: returns document records found using filter. Result limited to 100 records by default, sorted by validityDate desc.

parameters.name: createdBy
parameters.description: name or id of document creator user (full text search for more than first two characters)

parameters.name: district
parameters.description: district name or code or part of it (full text search for more than first two characters)

parameters.name: town
parameters.description: town name or code or part of it (full text search for more than first two characters)

parameters.name: deedOfOwnershipIsknId
parameters.description: unique deed of ownership ISKN id

parameters.name: realEstateId
parameters.description: document containing the given real estate id (crem id)

parameters.name: addressId
parameters.description: address id from RUIAN service Address

parameters.name: isknSiteId
parameters.description: iskn site id specified in deed of ownership document

parameters.name: isknBuildingId
parameters.description: iskn building id specified in deed of ownership document

parameters.name: isknFlatId
parameters.description: iskn flat id specified in deed of ownership document

parameters.name: isknBuildingRightId
parameters.description: iskn building right id specified in deed of ownership document

parameters.name: territory
parameters.description: cadastral territory name or number (full text search for more than first two characters)

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: sorting by multiple columns using response attribute names starting with +/- for ascending/descending. Example: sort_by=-validityDate,-documentId

post.summary: requests downloading of the new document from CUZK

get.summary: finds a building for given address id with a list of existing flats if any exist
advanced health check including WSDP call check
returns single real estate record for given id

post.summary: maintenance operation to bypass downloading the deed of ownership xml (or pdf with xml inside) file using local copy

put.summary: confirms paying the document price and downloading the new document from CUZK

get.summary: returns binary content of the document

schema.description: anonymized version of the document without any personal data
anonymized document content specific for selected company

get.summary: returns legal relations from the document

parameters.name: section
parameters.description: only specified deed of ownership section(s)

items.description: The list of deed of ownership sections for legal relations

get.summary: returns real estate objects from the document

put.summary: rebuilds the document record, document content and deed of ownership data

branch.description: Code of branch of the creator user

deedOfOwnershipIsknId.description: Unique ISKN deed of ownership id

documentPrice.description: Document price paid for obtaining the document

expirationDate.description: Expiration date of the document (to be removed from CREM)

isknReportId.description: ISKN unique report id of the document

onlineValuationPossible.description: False=document contains liens of CSC enum ZAST_JPV with attribute Modelové ocenění=N

pageCount.description: Number of pages of the document

partialDocument.description: An indication of a document with selected real estates only

publicDocument.description: An indication of an original version of PDF document created and electronically signed by Cadaster. This document is not machine readable

validityDate.description: Validity date of the document (Date of creation)

htmlText.description: Html description of the legal relation record

legalRelationCode.description: Code of legal relation enum (Zástavní právo smluvní,...)

orderDateTo.description: Date of legal relation for lien order evaluation

plainText.description: Plain text description of the legal relation record

section.description: The list of deed of ownership sections for legal relations

subjectIdentificationNumber.description: Subject identification number (IČO) in case of lien

DeedOfOwnershipLegalRelation.description: Legal relation attributes from deed of ownership

documentId.description: Deed of ownership document id in CREM

htmlText.description: HTML description of the real estate

isknId.description: Unique ISKN id of real estate (site, building, flat, building right)

plainText.description: Plain text description of the real estate

realEstateId.description: Unique id of CREM real estate record

realEstates.description: Decomposition of the real estate to all sub-entities if needed (for example flat in multiple buildings on multiple sites

DeedOfOwnershipRealEstate.description: Represents single real estate entity per record specified in deed of ownership with a decomposition to sub entities in a collection of real estates

documentPrice.description: document price in case of waiting for document generation+payment

DocumentStatus.description: Description of the document status with additional attributes

flats.description: The list of flats in the building

isknDeedOfOwnershipId.description: Iskn deed of ownership ID (unique identifier of the deed of ownership in CUZK

isknFlatId.description: Iskn flat ID (unique identifier of the flat in CUZK

buildingType.description: Code of building type enum (č.p.=1 / č.e.=2, ...)

flatNumber.description: Full flat number including the house before slash number if exists

isknRealEstateId.description: ISKN unique entity id if known

setPartialDocument.description: by default the document will be generated only for the selected real estates, otherwise the complete document for given set of real estates will be created

siteKind.description: Code of cadaster site enum evidence (PKN/PZE)

siteNumber.description: Full Site number including subsite number

sitePart.description: Site number part in case siteKind=PZE

siteSource.description: Code of cadaster site source enum in case siteKind=PZE

PartialDeedOfOwnershipRealEstate.description: Deed of ownership definition by a set of real estates defined by either unique iskn id or set of identification attributes

buildingIncluded.description: Shared parts of the building included (in case of flatType=Jednotka dle zákona 79)

buildingNumber.description: Complete list of building numbers divided by comma

buildingPartOf.description: Code of building part of enum (parcela součástí práva stavby, budovy, samostatná budova, dočasná budova)

buildingPartOfSite.description: Building part of site number in case of buildingPartOf=SITE

buildingType.description: Code of building type enum (č.p. / č.e., ...)

deedOfOwnBuilding.description: Deed of ownership of building if it belongs to another owner

deedOfOwnSite.description: Deed of ownership of site if it belongs to another owner

flatNumber.description: Full flat number including the house number if exists

flatType.description: Code of flat type enum (Jednotka dle NOZ, ...)

gpsLatitude.description: GPS latitude of the site definition point

gpsLongitude.description: GPS longitude of the site definition point

isMainBuilding.description: True in case of the main building if flat is defined in multiple buildings. Only one building is the main one

isknFlatNumber.description: Specific formatted flat number (always with 4 digits) starting with a house number

mannerOfProtection.description: Code of manner of use protection enum

mannerOfUseBuilding.description: Code of manner of use building enum

mannerOfUseBuildingRight.description: Code of manner of use building right enum

mannerOfUseFlat.description: Code of manner of use flat enum

mannerOfUseSite.description: Code of manner of use site enum

originalTerritory.description: Name of the original cadastral territory

propertyIncluded.description: Shared parts of the real estate property included (in case of flatType=Jednotka dle zákona NOZ)

siteKind.description: Code of cadaster site enum evidence (PKN/PZE)

sitePart.description: Site number part in case siteKind=PZE

siteSource.description: Code of cadaster site source enum in case siteKind=PZE

sitesIncluded.description: Shared parts of the sites included (in case of flatType=Jednotka dle zákona 79)

RealEstate.description: Evidence of all entities(site, building, flat, building right), its attributes and relations. In case of 1:N relations (1 flat in multiple buildings on multiple sites it means N records (usually N=number of sites) of this entity, always with the corresponding attributes for a given record

isknDeedOfOwnershipId.description: Deed of ownership ISKN unique ID (an alternative to territoryNumber+deedOfOwnershipNumber)

publicDocument.description: True for request of public document (PDF for reading purposes only)

realEstates.description: The collection of real estate entities in case of partial deed of ownership request (single entity type is supported for a document)

validityDate.description: Validity date of the document (default today or date in history)

RequestDownloadDeedOfOwnership.description: A new document download from CUZK request specification

ResponseGetFlatsForAddressDTO.description: Response object for search building by address

items.description: Collection of legal relations in a deed of ownership document

ResponseGetLegalRelations.description: Response object for legal relations import from deed of ownership document

items.description: Collection of owners in a deed of ownership document

ResponseGetOwners.description: Response object for owners import from deed of ownership document

items.description: Collection of real estates in a deed of ownership document

ResponseGetRealEstates.description: Response object for real estates import from deed of ownership document

ResponseSearchDeedOfOwnershipDocuments.description: Response object for searching existing deed of ownership documents

ResponseUploadDocumentDTO.description: Response object for upload xml/pdf document
